-   A primer on Github - [Github skills](https://skills.github.com/)

-   A comprehensive guide on git using R in particular - [Happy git with R](https://happygitwithr.com/)

-   An interactive website to learn about git branching at different levels - [Git Branching](https://learngitbranching.js.org/)

-   A two-day workshop with examples on how to use Quarto - [Getting Started with Quarto by Tom Mock](https://rstudio-conf-2022.github.io/get-started-quarto/)
